meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Radiola, especially Radiola linoides, with small white flowers and round seeds.
meanings.sent1: The allseed in the garden had delicate white flowers.
meanings.sent2: I collected some allseed to plant in my backyard.
meanings.sent3: The allseed decided to throw a party for the other plants.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening was an allseed that blossomed into a beautiful passion.
meanings.sent5: The allseed's round seeds were like tiny pearls scattered in the soil.

meanings.definition: A seed of any plant of the genus Radiola.
meanings.sent1: Each allseed is a potential new plant waiting to grow.
meanings.sent2: The allseed was carefully placed in the soil to sprout.
meanings.sent3: The allseed rolled away and played hide-and-seek with the other seeds.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were like allseeds, scattered and ready to take root in minds.
meanings.sent5: The allseed held the promise of a future garden in its tiny form.
